original_text: You people of Moab laughed at my people, the Israelites. Why did you insult them? You said that they were no better than a group of robbers. You people of Moab laughed at my people, the Israelites. Why did you insult them? You said that they were no better than a group of robbers. You people of Moab laughed at my people, the Israelites.
korean_text: 네가 이스라엘을 조롱하지 아니하였느냐 그가 도둑 가운데에서 발견되었느냐 네가 그를 말할 때마다 네 머리를 흔드는도다

sentences.original_text: no better than a group of robbers
